channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ME
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ME

item.title: Report X-2023120172
item.description:
Report X-2023120172

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-30
  • City: LEWISTON
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The Package was discovered on a trailer during the unload process. the package was on its side and wet. the item was placed in a tote and brought to the QA dept for further investigation. It was identified as a hazmat due to the labels. The proper process for handling a hazmat was then initiated. DescribePack: The package had wet stains along the closure and side of the package. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: The package was immediately placed in a tote and brought to the QA dept. The QA personnel then placed the item in a red hazmat tote indicating to staff this is hazardous. The proper paperwork was then initiated and the product was contained safely in the tote.
